title: American Pancakes
description: American pancakes are a perfect breakfast if you want something sweet. They're easy to make and contain ingredients that most people have at home!
recipe:
Step 1:
Melt the butter and add eggs and milk.
Step 2:
Add the rest of the ingredients to the mixture.
Step 3:
Cook on medium heat until golden. Grease your pan in between each set of pancakes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Spaghetti Carbonara is a classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. It's creamy, savory, and satisfying!
recipe:
Step 1:
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Step 2:
While spaghetti cooks, fry bacon until crispy.
Step 3:
Whisk eggs, cheese, and black pepper in a bowl.
Step 4:
Drain spaghetti and add to bacon, then pour egg mixture over pasta. Toss until well coated. Serve immediately.
